name: Plague of Athens VR
storyline: Immerse yourself in the gripping saga of Plague of Athens VR, an immersive journey that transports you back to the darkest days of the first recorded pandemic in 429 BCE. Step into the sandals of Nikos of Athens, a young physician challenged with treating countless Athenians struck by the plague. As Athens descends into chaos, the VR narrative unfolds through the eyes of Nikos. The dilemmas that Nikos encounters shatter his world view, prompting him to question everything he holds dear. His faith in Apollo, the divine healer, is tested, as is the meaning of his Hippocratic Oath.
summary: Plague of Athens tells the story of Nikos of Athens, a physician during history’s first recorded pandemic, 429 BCE, who struggles to treat the multitude who fall ill during this world-upending ordeal.
